00042 #ifndef _PartioParticleAttribute_h_
00043 #define _PartioParticleAttribute_h_
00044 namespace Partio{
00045 
00046 // Particle Types
00047 enum ParticleAttributeType {NONE=0,VECTOR=1,FLOAT=2,INT=3};
00048 
00049 template<ParticleAttributeType ENUMTYPE> struct ETYPE_TO_TYPE
00050 
00051 {struct UNUSABLE;typedef UNUSABLE TYPE;};
00052 template<> struct ETYPE_TO_TYPE<VECTOR>{typedef float TYPE;};
00053 template<> struct ETYPE_TO_TYPE<FLOAT>{typedef float TYPE;};
00054 template<> struct ETYPE_TO_TYPE<INT>{typedef int TYPE;};
00055 
00056 template<class T1,class T2> struct
00057 IS_SAME{static const bool value=false;};
00058 template<class T> struct IS_SAME<T,T>{static const bool value=true;};
00059 
00060 template<class T> bool
00061 typeCheck(const ParticleAttributeType& type)
00062 {
00063     // if T is void, don't bother checking what we passed in
00064     if (IS_SAME<T,void>::value) return true;
00065     switch(type){
00066         case VECTOR: return IS_SAME<typename ETYPE_TO_TYPE<VECTOR>::TYPE,T>::value;
00067         case FLOAT: return IS_SAME<typename ETYPE_TO_TYPE<FLOAT>::TYPE,T>::value;
00068         case INT: return IS_SAME<typename ETYPE_TO_TYPE<INT>::TYPE,T>::value;
00069         default: return false; // unknown type
00070     }
00071 }
00072 
00073 int TypeSize(ParticleAttributeType attrType);
00074 std::string TypeName(ParticleAttributeType attrType);
00075 
00076 // Particle Attribute Specifier
00078 
00083 class ParticleAttribute
00084 {
00085 public:
00087     ParticleAttributeType type;
00088 
00090     int count;
00091 
00093     std::string name;
00094 
00096     int attributeIndex;
00097 
00100     // std::string comment;
00101 };
00102 }
00103 #endif
